body_content.explanation: a play in American football worth three points, made by kicking the ball between the other team’s goalposts:
examples: He led his team to seven touchdowns and two field goals.
He set up the winning field goal with a late interception.

body_content.explanation: an act of scoring in basketball that is made by putting the ball through the basket (= goal) from anywhere on the court (= playing area) while the action of the game is going on:
examples: He was successful in 10 out of 13 field goal attempts from the floor.
You score points in basketball by making field goals from the floor or free throws from the free-throw line.
Their power forward has the highest field goal percentage (= the highest rate of success in making shots) in the league.
